# blacklisted

**Type Property**

A former error code that indicates the system has revoked the Metal device’s access because it’s responsible for too many timeouts or hangs.

## Declaration

```swift
static var blacklisted: MTLCommandBufferError.Code { get }
```
title: blacklisted
